src:
プレミア１２、日本が白星発進…ベネズエラ破る

05 Nov 2019, 14:09



５回１死満塁、鈴木が適時打を放つ（５日）＝中嶋基樹撮影

　野球の東京五輪予選を兼ねる国際大会「プレミア１２」（読売新聞社協賛）は５日、台湾・桃園などで１次ラウンドＢ組の２試合が行われ、日本代表「侍ジャパン」は８―４でベネズエラを破り、白星発進した。台湾は６―１でプエルトリコに勝った。メキシコのサポパンでは４日、Ａ組の米国がドミニカ共和国を１０―８で下して２勝１敗とし、日本で行われる２次ラウンド進出を決めた。Ｃ組は６日にソウルで始まる。
text:
Premier 12, Japan launches white star ... Venezuela breaks

05 Nov 2019, 14:09



5 times, 1 death, Suzuki hits timely (5th)

The international tournament “Premier 12” (sponsored by the Yomiuri Shimbun), which also serves as the baseball qualifier for the Tokyo Olympics, will be played on the 5th in Taiwan ’s Taoyuan, where the first round B group will be played. Then defeated Venezuela and started off. Taiwan won Puerto Rico 6-1. In Zapopan, Mexico, Group A, the United States, defeated the Dominican Republic by 10-8 and scored 2 wins and 1 loss, and decided to advance to the second round in Japan. Group C starts in Seoul on the 6th.
